review: I was lucky enough to get one of these for 20 bucks.  It gave me an incentive to buy it and try it.  That being said, so far I have been happy.  It is easy to use and is pretty small.  Reason for the 4 stars is the fact it needs to be plugged into the wall.  I have enough plugs in my wall already that I dont need to add another.  I am going to try to add a portable power supply to the back and see if that works.  Regardless, this is a pretty solid, easy to use item.  I have had no issues other then the first day when I couldnt get hulu or netflix to work.  They work now.I would say even at 40 bucks this is a pretty solid buy, you get a lot of channels and it works great with prime.
author: Chris W. "mikeystoyz"

review: Two stars merely for the design. I liked the idea of having a dedicated prime instant video device. Unfortunately, this product falls way short in terms of usability. Ten to fifteen minutes of playback is all I can manage before it loses connection and/or buffers indefinitely. At $19 it hardly seems worth sending it back, hopefully a future update corrects the issues.
